item.title: Neti for your health
item.description: Flush those nostrils :) Winter’s the season for the sniffles. Combine that with the COVID pandemic that has put a strain on the healthcare system, and prevention of common ailments is becoming extremely important for us all. Luckily there is a simple solution to lessen the severity of (and in some cases prevent) these conditions. Disclaimer: I am not a medical professional, and although will be providing links to medical resources and practices, this does not replace professional medical advice.
